CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Diagnosis Confirmed stage positioned above or below the Treatment Initiated stage?
SRP.A: The Diagnosis Confirmed stage is positioned {above} the Treatment Initiated stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Consultation?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Consultation is {4694}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnostic Testing?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnostic Testing is {3124}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {4694}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Initiated, with a value of {1276}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {819} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated?
SC.A: Decreased by {269} Patients from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {1570} Patients from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1925? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Consultation} stage has {4694}, the {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {3124}, the {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {2305}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1925? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1545}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {1276}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1925 and 2714? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to {Diagnostic Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, or from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to {Diagnosis Confirmed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to stage {Diagnostic Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Consultation} and {Diagnostic Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Recommended} and {Treatment Initiated} stages.
